text: Avaṉē vāṉaṅkaḷaiyum pūmiyaiyum paṭaittavaṉ. Uṅkaḷiliruntē (uṅkaḷ) maṉaivikaḷaiyum avaṉ uṅkaḷukkāka paṭaikkiṟāṉ. (Āṭu, māṭu, oṭṭakam mutaliya) kālnaṭaikaḷaiyum jōṭi jōṭiyāka paṭaittu, uṅkaḷaip pūmiyiṉ pala pākaṅkaḷilum paravip perukac ceykiṟāṉ. Avaṉukku oppāṉatu oṉṟumillai. Avaṉ (aṉaittaiyum) ceviyuṟupavaṉ, uṟṟu nōkkupavaṉ āvāṉ
